title: Introduction
description: Build an advanced automated testing pipeline for .NET 8 MVC apps using AWS CodeBuild and CodeQL

title: Session Management
content:
Work with Amazon System Manager - Session Manager Overall In this lab, you’ll learn the basics and practice of Amazon System Manager - Session Manager . Perform creating public and private instance connections.
Content Introduction Preparation Connect to EC2 instance Manage session logs Port Forwarding Clean up resources
